Literature.Title: Designed peptide with a flexible central motif from ranatuerins adapts its conformation to bacterial membranes.
Literature.Author: Juretic D, Sonavane Y, Ilic N, Gajski G, Goić-Barisić I, Tonkić M, Kozic M, Maravic A, Pellay FX, Zoranić L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>200 µM,Human skin fibroblasts:50% Cell death=30 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.125-0.25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=0.25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=0.5-1.0µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MBC=1.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=4.0-8.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=0.25-0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=0.5-1.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=4.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MBC=4.0-8.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=1.0µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=0.125-0.5µM),Escherichia coli(MBC=0.125-0.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=0.5-1.0µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=1.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2.0-4.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=4.0-8.0µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=0.5-1.0µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MBC=1.0µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=2.0-4.0µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MBC=4.0-8.0µM)
